text: melum, enta anmavum (munnare) elutappattirukkum tavanaikku inanka, allahavin anumatiyinri, maranippatillai. Evarenum inta ulakattin palanai (mattum) virumpinal, nam avarukku atilirunte valankuvom;. Innum evar, marumaiyin nanmaiyai virumpukiraro avarukku atiliruntu valankuvom;. Nanriyutaiyorukku ati cikkaramaka narkuli kotukkirom
